com.ephesoft.dcma.heartbeat

Class HeartBeat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.heartbeat.HeartBeat

  • public final class HeartBeat
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for watching all the servers registered with the common database pool. If any of the server is down or not active this service will mark that registry entry as in active such that other servers can pick the entry corresponding to this shut down server.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    HeartBeatServiceImpl

      This method will check the health of all the servers registered to the common data base pool.
